applyTo: "**/*.js"
---

# Project general coding standards for JavaScript
- Prefer function syntax over arrow syntax
- No template literals
- Use `let` instead of `const` in for...of and for...in declarations
- No use of computed property names in object initialzer
- No setTimeout or setInterval
- Always use JSDOC
- No var declarations, always use let or const
- No optional chaining
